name: Ariel Cleanomancer and the Eldritch Sweep
name_original: Ariel Cleanomancer and the Eldritch Sweep
description:
Now with a working ending screen!!

This hotel has some strange molds!

You're Ariel. Fledgling cleanomancer, for your final test, your sensei abandoned you inside of a weird, possibly haunted hotel. Let's say it, she dropped you inside and locked the door behind you. Well, what are you gonna do? You're gonna clean the hell out of these floors, that's what! And get out of here! But you keep running out of magic fuel... Uff, this ain't gonna be easy.

Gameplay

You can play using either a keyboard or a controller.

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • E to vacuum.
  • Spacebar to turbo-vacuum!
  • Watch your magic fuel!
  • R to reset the level.
  • Clean all the trash to unlock the stairs!

If the game sounds glitchy or oversaturated, try to download the game and play locally.

Post your diplomas below!

Credits

  • Professor of Code Cleaning: Manu BH 
  • Professor of Musical Laundry: Nuelijarma
  • Professor of Tableware Graphics: alyd asmar
  • Professor of Vacuum Design: fae.exe

Made with Godot 3.3.

Thanks to Tim Krief for his Random Audio Stream Player Nodes plug-in for Godot.

Using the font from PICO-8 !
